item.title: Typekit
item.description: I’ve been using Typekit to serve up the fonts you see here and have been very pleased. Normally, when you want to use a custom font on your website, you need to make sure it’s a font that your visitors have installed on their machines. If they don’t have that particular font, their browser will revert to using a default, and ugly, backup. However, Typekit lets you use any font you want, even if the visitor doesn’t have it installed.
